Topic.Title: The New Message Board Format Sucks!

Message.Msg: (((When co's change their site,they should first submit it to perhaps a person with 10th. grade education. The whiz kids that design things seem to be writing crap for other whiz kids They never test the new stuff on potential users.))) They are testing it right now on us.

Topic.Title: The New Message Board Format Sucks!

Message.Title: IBM starting to look like GE Message Board
Message.Msg: Anybody look at the political cesspool that is the GE board? It is horrible and now the political posts are coming over here too. THIS IS A BUSINESS BOARD. Not a political discussion forum, there are thousands of other good places on the web for that chat. EGAD people, let's discuss Big Blue here, certainly we have enough to talk about on that subject.

Topic.Title: IBM starting to look like GE Message Board

Message.Msg: You should see other message boards.

Message.Msg: Excellent for low growth, low interest rates environment.

Topic.Title: $$$....VIX:trend lines suggest that a stock sell-off lies ahead, a Citigroup technical analyst

Message.Msg: I would agree that a sell off is in order. This is expected after a nice run up. However, the markets will then head higher by the end of the year. Maybe 1450-1475 on S&P? I expect IBM to make new highs in 2012.

Topic.Title: $$$....VIX:trend lines suggest that a stock sell-off lies ahead, a Citigroup technical analyst

Message.Msg: "five for five" ? Then its due to go five for six. This is a game of mathematics. Mathematics rules out over trends and graphs, "Citi FX Technicals Chief Technicial Tom Fitzpatrick pointed to a pattern going back three decades." Three decades? Way over due for a correction of that pattern.

Message.Msg: They are special ...
